jump_scares.spoiler: Mirroring the final jump scare from the first film, Angela is pulled back into the darkness
After Martos turns around in the apartment hallway, an infected comes running at him
Martos, now an infected, lunges at the camera
Out of nowhere, an infected boy drops down from the ceiling and grabs Larra
The infected boy suddenly jumps onto the priest’s back
When Larra turns, an infected appears in the doorway
An infected girl appears at the end of the hallway
Ori accidentally fires a gun
Ori fires a second shot
An infected suddenly jumps out from the kitchen
Infected Martos lunges at the group
A hand shoots out of the water and grabs the SWAT chief
The creature appears and starts attacking Rosso
The creature suddenly appears behind the priest and attacks him
Angela shoots Rosso
The camera suddenly cuts to the scene from the beginning of the film of Angela being dragged into the darkness

movies.title: A Girl Walks Home Alone at Night

jump_scares.spoiler: A shadowy figure passes the window behind James and the camera footage cuts out
An image of James with a disfigured face briefly flashes across the camera footage
A loud bang in an otherwise quiet scene may startle some people
Anne shines the torch on a figure standing in the darkness
An invisible force appears to drag Patient 11 away
Patient 11 suddenly screams and pounds on the observation window
Anne sees a mysterious figure standing by the window
There is a loud bang followed by screaming
Anne shines the torch on Callie who now has black eyes and is vomiting a red liquid
Patient 14 begins to scream and shake violently
Patient 14 suddenly appears in front of the scientist
Anne looks in the car mirror and sees Thomas’s face has turned a red color
A hand grabs Anne around the ankle as she walks up the stairs
Thomas wakes up in the back seat and yells which startles Anne
A researcher gets an electric shock
The corpse on the examination table suddenly screams and grabs the researcher around the neck
Anne looks into a hole built into the wall and a pale face with hollow eyes suddenly appears
Anne looks down a corridor and sees an alien figure coming towards her
Something begins to bang on the door
A hand with long fingers suddenly appears on the locker that Anne is hiding in
Anne turns around and sees a grotesque figure standing beside her
Anne turns around and sees her friends face has the same black eyes and deformed expression as previous victims
Teddy the bear pops up on the edge of the bed
The dollhouse bursts open
A silhouette of a demon appears in the hallway
Benny appears behind the phone
Jack slaps her across the face
A scarab scuttles across the frame as the woman looks over the bed
Brief flashes to a car while Elvis is in bed
Scarab jumps suddenly at Elvis
Scarab jumps out of the bowl
Several cuts to photos as Elvis enters the room accompanied by a sound effect
Elvis is woken up by a hand grabbing him with a sound effect
The nurse turns and a man in standing right behind her
Bubba Ho-Tep attacks Elvis from behind the tree
Bubba Ho-Tep steps into frame
There is a sudden cut to a horror film on TV in which a screaming woman covered in blood swings a knife towards the camera
A phone suddenly rings
Enid walks into a room to see her mom with her back turned. There is a cut to Enid, and then a sudden cut back to the mom with her screaming at the camera
Meg turns around and comes face to face with her dad
A hand enters the tent, startling one of the boys sleeping in it
The clown grabs the boy’s wrist as he approaches
Meg sees a figure move past the screen on the camera footage she is reviewing
Jack touches his mother which causes her to scream
The clown appears in front of Meg
As Jack peeks out of an opening, the clown suddenly appears
A large concrete block moves across the opening
The clown rips through some floor boards causing Jack to scream
The clown suddenly stands up and runs at Meg
The apparently dead clown suddenly grabs Meg around the leg
While Faith walks through the house in a dream sequence, her father suddenly drops down from the ceiling right in front of her face
Faith looks to her side and there is a cut to some masked coven members standing in the room accompanied by a sound effect
Faith leans forwards and Sissy is revealed to be standing behind her
There is a cut with a sound effect to a masked coven member watching Amy from a window
Faith says “My son is the devil,” followed by a cut to the child and a quick zoom as his face becomes distorted
Aaron is startled by Josef while in his car
Josef surfaces from under the water in the bathtub
Aaron pulls back a curtain and is startled by a scary mask
Josef jumps out from behind a boulder and scares Aaron

Josef wakes up suddenly
There is a noise
Josef starts speaking behind Aaron
Aaron is startled by a loud noise while he is in bed
Josef appears in front of the camera and lets out a scream. [Video]
A silhoutte runs past the camera
A woman runs out of the darkness and shrieks
Guy’s bloody hand grabs the side of the metro door
Kate looks around the corner and there is a cut to a dog that’s barking at her
Kate touches a sleeping man, frightening him and causing him to bolt upwards
The security guard is grabbed by the killer from behind
Jimmy is grabbed by the killer from above
A dead body rises from the water
Kate turns the flashlight back on and the killer is right in front of the camera. (No accompanying sound.
Upon crawling through a passage a woman is suddenly dragged upwards
A corpse suddenly springs back up and makes a gasping noise
A cup on the table suddenly moves on its own
As Graham reaches for the cup it suddenly flies off the table
The pictures on the wall suddenly fall off on their own
Erin moves to reveal a ghost woman standing right behind her
As the vlogger approaches a hole in a bricked up wall to investigate a noise, a bird suddenly flies out
Erin screams at something and the camera rotates to reveal the ghost woman standing right behind Graham
As the cameraman approaches a doll it suddenly jumps out at him
Graham begins to nudge the sheets on the floor with his foot when the sheets suddenly fly up in the figure of the ghost woman
As Graham approaches a room, the ghost woman becomes visible in the corner, which startles him
Graham slowly moves into the room when the ghost woman suddenly runs out from behind the corner and towards the camera
The ghost woman’s hands suddenly break out of the wall and grab Graham
Graham points the camera at the door which suddenly slams on its own
Graham opens the door to reveal the ghost woman standing right behind it as she lunges out at him
Graham turns around and the ghost woman is right behind him
A woman dressed in white appears beside Frank’s car window
Laura pokes at a skull on the wall and it falls to the floor, startling her
Brad peeks at the baby and discovers that it is dead
Richard gets out of the car to investigate the baby’s pram on the road, as he looks in he pretends to be pulled into the carriage and eaten
There is a loud noise and the car shakes as a tire blows out
There is a sudden bump as the car hits something
Frank lights a match and the woman in white is standing right behind him
The silhouette of someone appears at the window beside Marion
Marion turns around and runs into the woman in white
As Sloane hides in the apartment, suddenly the phone on the table rings
Sloane is pulled forward under the table
As Gwen walks through her apartment and passes the mirror again, you suddenly see the figure of a man. This is accompanied by a sound effect
Patrick is suddenly grabbed from behind
Patrick’s arguing with Sullivan. Suddenly, one of the soldiers standing around them is shot
Sloane and Melanie are talking. As Sloane turns around again, the doctor’s hand suddenly comes out of the bushes and grabs her
Patrick is looking for someone with the flashlight. When he turns around, there’s a man standing behind him. This is accompanied by a sound effect
Melanie runs with Sloane and Damon through the water in the cave. She grabs a rock and shines into a dark corner where suddenly a man is standing
After Damon says “Lets go” he is suddenly attacked by the doctor from the side
Sloane sees a double of her. After she says “I will never be you again”, the doctor attacks her
Patrick is suddenly attacked by Melanie with a knife
Sloane is attacked again by her double
Behind Melanie a man suddenly jumps out of the water and pulls her in
The boy is suddenly standing behind the refrigerator
When Gail and Luke are playing the piano, the keyboard lid slams shut out of nowhere
Ruth suddenly appears behind Gail and Josh
Josh suddenly screams
There is a sudden noise in the distance
As the group look around the room with a flashlight, there is suddenly a cut to a creepy old man behind some shelves who turns at the camera with a sound cue
Paulina leans in towards the seemingly dead creepy old man, who suddenly grabs her the shoulder
A sudden, very loud noise scares the entire group
Claire approaches Dave in bed before disappearing. When, Dave turns around, she is right in front of his face
While walking backwards, Alan runs into the creepy old man
The soldier touches the seemingly dead man with a knife, and he springs back up
Alan turns around, shining the light on the creepy old man who is standing right in front of him
As Paulina slowly reaches out for her son’s shoulder, he quickly turns around
The son runs at Paulina, briefly going out of frame. When he reappears, his face shifts and he begins attacking Paulina
There is a sudden earthquake
A closet door closes on its own, revealing Claire with a knife behind it
Claire appears on screen and screams as she attacks the camera
A sudden scream is heard in the distance
As Tyler and Paulina walk into the dark corridor, there is a gasping sound right in front of them
The camera’s night vision shows a woman right in front of Tyler and Paulina who looks up at the camera and screams
The water begins to bubble, scaring Paulina
Paulina looks up from the ground and sees her son right in front of her, who then screams
Paulina stands up, and there is a rotting corpse right in front of her face
Paulina looks down from the ceiling with the flashlight and shines it on Pepe

A silhouette watches Laurie walk away from the house

Myers pops up from behind a sofa
Some viewers might be startled by a loud gunshot as Ann shoots a zombie

The camera rounds a corner to see a clown figure standing in the hallway
A scary-looking clown’s head is suddenly looking straight at the camera
A clown figure is seen standing in a doorway at the bottom of stairs
Bedcovers are lifted to reveal a  girl’s bloody face
The camera turns back to reveal scary clown mannequins sitting on the ground
A black figure standing behind a girl suddenly moves towards the camera, while screams are heard

movies.title: Hell House LLC II: The Abaddon Hotel

jump_scares.spoiler: A woman with pale eyes is seen in a dark basement
The camera pans across to find one of the mannequins sitting at a table is now standing up facing the camera
A bloody woman with pale eyes appears in front of the camera. After holding on the shot for several seconds, the camera zooms in on her eyes
A clown mannequin’s arm and head moves
A door slams shut
A woman with pale eyes blinks, and a female screams
A wall suddenly explodes, revealing a red portal
The camera image glitches with an image of a clown’s face
A bloody girl with yellow eyes and black lips appears in front of the camera
A man playing piano turns to reveal a bloody gash where his eye should be
A hammer suddenly strikes out of the hole in the wall
A knock is heard at Seylan’s door, which is revealed to just be a late delivery
Jemma suddenly screams loudly as she claims to have felt something touch her neck
Haley is suddenly dragged backwards in her chair
A loud thud is heard
Emma’s drinking glass suddenly shatters
A warbling sound is heard as the lights in everyone’s rooms begin to flicker

Emma’s cabinet doors burst open

Haley’s chair gets pulled away

A scream is heard as another explosion occurs, blowing Teddy backwards

Haley’s cabinets and drawers burst open
Hayley appears from under the desk as her chair knocks over
As Haley snaps a portrait, a mysterious and bloodied figure suddenly screams and lunges towards her and Jemma, but is then abruptly cut off due to the Zoom meeting reaching its time limit

The woman suddenly attacks Frank
A demon smashes through the wall as Frank turns around

Frank looks down on the floor and sees there is a demon right underneath him
